parsetree.*:
<root><comment><!-- setSimpleTaskCustomData --></comment>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.58</value></part><part><name>Game Version (number surrounded by NO SPACES)</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Briefing </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set custom data for the task. Tooltip will be drawn in task list on the right side. Description will be drawn in task description panel on the bottom. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> task '''setSimpleTaskCustomData''' [IconPath, tooltip, description] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> task: [[Task]] - task the custom data are being added to </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> iconPath: [[String]] - icon path </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> tooltip: [[String]] - text displayed next to the icon; max. 3 charactersc </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> description: [[String]] - text displayed on the task description panel; html format </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> Nothing </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[taskCustomData]], [[setSimpleTaskType]], [[taskType]], [[Arma_3_Tasks_Overhaul|Tasks Overhaul]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>
